roleset.name: to pound with a beetle -- no, really!
roleset.note: BEETLE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. (from beetle.01-v)

roleset.name: to move, travel like a beetle
roleset.note: BEETLE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. (from beetle.02-v)

example.text: She loved it, and while I waited in line again to pay for it, she beetled about the shop's floor looking incontestably happy with herself.
example.arg: while I wanted in line again to pay for it
